segments.text: Oh , there is something wrong with my car .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Your car is rather old . Why not change a new one ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I want to change a new car . I like Honda best , especially the red one . But it is too expensive .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Oh , there is a car exhibition tomorrow afternoon . I have two tickets . Would you like to go there with me ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yeah . Maybe I can find my favorite car in addition to Honda .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: And the bank will offer you loans for twenty years !
segments.speaker: S2
